articles.title: S. Phyongan Provincial Meeting of Delegates for WPK Conference Held
articles.content:
S. Phyongan Provincial Meeting of Delegates for WPK Conference Held
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting of delegates of South Phyongan Province of the Workers' Party of Korea took place in Phyongsong City on Aug. 26, according to Rodong Sinmun Saturday.
					 Attending the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and delegates elected by city and county party committees and party organizations of units at different levels with the same functions in the province and primary party organizations of bodies of the provincial level. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of electing delegates to the conference of the WPK. 
					
					Hong In Bom, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK who is delegate of the party organization of Phyongsong City, said in his speech on the election that the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK is a manifestation of the undisputed trust in him and transparent loyalty to him of all the party members and people in the province deepened in the course of the historic struggle, in which they have covered only the road of victory and glory, invariably holding him at the highest posts of the Party and the revolution, and the reflection of the requirements of the era for the victory of the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il clearly indicated the orientation and ways for the province to follow while giving field guidance to hundreds of units in the province and his wise leadership and patriotic devotion brought about a stirring reality in the province.
					
					 It is the greatest luck and glory and immense pride of all the Koreans to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem, he said, courteously proposing the election of Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK.
					
					 Delegates of party organizations in the province in their speeches were unanimous in warmly supporting and approving his proposal.
					
					 A decision on electing Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK was adopted at the meeting with a unanimous approval, representing the will and desire of all the party members and people in the province.
					
					 The meeting also elected delegates to the conference of the WPK.

articles.title: Sympathy Message from Russian President
articles.content:
Sympathy Message from Russian President
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Saturday received a message of sympathy from D. Medvedev, President of the Russian Federation.
					 The message said:
					
					 I received news that the national economy and people of your country suffered big material losses due to flood that hit provinces in the northern part of the DPRK.
					
					 I express sincere sympathy and consolation to all the people who suffered losses due to this natural disaster.
					
					 I hope that situation in the flood stricken areas will return to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Youth Day Observed
articles.content:
Youth Day Observed
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Youth and students across the DPRK significantly marked the Youth Day Saturday.
					 They joyously spent the day, looking back on the victorious and glorious road covered by the Korean youth movement under the leadership of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Yang Hyong Sop and leading officials of party and power bodies and working people's organizations in Pyongyang and local areas visited Kim Il Sung University, the Sunchon Cement Complex, the Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill, the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other industrial establishments, farms and universities to congratulate the youth and students on the day.
					
					 Senior state officials together with youth and students laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung, monuments to revolutionary activities of the peerlessly great persons and other places in their respective units and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the revolutionary museums, the rooms devoted to the education in revolutionary relics, the rooms devoted to the history of units. They also met and conversed with exemplary youth and students.
					
					 They congratulated youth and students on their innovations effected in production and construction and achievements made in study by displaying revolutionary enthusiasm and spirit and called on them to give full play to the heroic stamina as Songun young vanguard in the on-going advance for a great surge.
					
					 Youth and students gave art performances and had sports and amusement games on the day.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held on Youth Day
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held on Youth Day
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the country on the Youth Day which falls on today. 
					 In the plazas of the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Arch of Triumph Square and other venues of dancing parties in the city young people began presenting pleasant dances amid song "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General".
					
					 They danced beautiful dances to the tune of merry melodies with the honor and pride of glorifying the history and tradition of the glorious Juche-based youth movement, being blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation.
					
					 When "Fortune of Korea," "Our General Is the Best" and other songs resounded forth, the places of dancing parties were filled with profound thanks and trust in leader Kim Jong Il who trained and put forward the youth as reliable successors to the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in different provincial capitals, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: New Documentary Film Produced
articles.content:
New Documentary Film Produced
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- "The People's Army Has Grown to Be a Powerful Revolutionary Army of Mt. Paektu", Part 4 of the documentary film "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World" was produced.
					The film deals with the historical facts that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has trained the Korean People's Army into a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique for the last five decades since he started the Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA.
					
					 The film tells that Kim Jong Il, possessed of iron faith and will to complete with arms the Korean revolution which was started and advanced with arms, has directed primary efforts to strengthening the KPA into the army of the leader, the army of the Party firmly based on the revolutionary view on the leader, the Party leadership system.
					
					 It has scenes showing the admirable appearance of the KPA which has been trained into a match-for-a hundred stalwart fighters equipped with the WPK's military idea and Juche-based war methods and the most elite powerful army having modern offensive and defensive means under the care of the most illustrious commander.

articles.title: DPRK Committee for Investigation Urges Japan to Pay for All Its Crimes
articles.content:
DPRK Committee for Investigation Urges Japan to Pay for All Its Crimes
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Committee for Investigation into the Damage Done by the Japanese Imperialists during their Occupation of Korea Saturday issued a statement on the lapse of a century since the illegal and invalid "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" was promulgated by the Japanese imperialists.
					 The statement cited facts to prove that after legalizing their occupation of Korea by the illegal and brigandish methods the Japanese imperialists inflicted unspeakable misfortune and disaster upon the Koreans while enforcing the harshest colonial rule.
					
					 After the defeat, too, the Japanese reactionaries have frantically pursued the moves for reviving militarism and staging a comeback to Korea including the distortion of history, moves to grab Tok Islets, sanctions against the DPRK and rackets against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, far from honestly repenting of their crime-woven history and making reparation for it, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 The hypocritical statement issued by the Japanese prime minister recently on the lapse of a century since the fabrication of the treaty was nothing but a cynical ploy to evade the responsibility for the past aggression and it is only adding to the said crimes.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' moves for reviving militarism and staging a comeback to Korea have entered a graver phase due to the Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					 No matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how often the generation is placed by a new one, the Korean people will never forget the bloody aggression committed by the Japanese reactionaries but surely settle accounts with them and deal merciless sledgehammer blows at the Lee Myung Bak group keen to seek a way out in selling off the dignity and interests of the nation to outsiders.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should sincerely repent of the past crimes and make reparation for them and immediately roll back the hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop such anachronistic acts as fostering Korea's permanent division and the confrontation between the north and the south and obstructing the reunification of Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Rhetoric Rebuked
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Rhetoric Rebuked
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, at a recent "commemorative academic meeting" blustered that the "peaceful community" and the "economic community" mean the process of stepping up "denuclearization in parallel with economic cooperation" and "unification tax" was not proposed "with a particular situation in the north including 'contingency' in mind." He went the lengths of raving that the "issue should be settled from broad perspective and deep understanding, looking far into the future rather than the immediate improvement of the south-north relations."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Hyon uttered is peppered with sheer hypocrisy and excuses as it is designed to justify traitor Lee Myung Bak's traitorous and anti-reunification theory of confrontation strongly rejected and censured by the people of different social standings and put it into practice at any cost.
					
					 The string of sheer nonsense let loose by Hyon to defend the chief executive was prompted by his cynical ploy to calm down the strong opposition from the people from all walks of life.
					
					 As evidenced by Hyon's wordplay about "broad perspective and deep understanding", the Lee Myung Bak group has no willingness to save the inter-Korean relations from the present worst crisis but only watches for a chance to do harm and stifle the DPRK in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 Only stern and merciless punishment await the group of despicable traitors as they have desperately pursued confrontation and war moves, quite contrary to the trend of the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 The group will be forced to pay a dear price for its crimes against the nation and reunification.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak Accused of His Disgusting Behavior
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak Accused of His Disgusting Behavior
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- It was recently disclosed that traitor Lee Myung Bak made such disgusting proposal as expressing the intention of south Korea to host the U.S. military base in Futenma when meeting U.S. President Obama in Canada in late June.
					 Minju Joson Saturday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Japanese people have rejected the U.S. military base in Futenma and the authorities of Japan are troubled with this issue. Yet, Lee proposed hosting this base in south Korea, an intolerable act of treachery. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that in case the U.S. military base in Futenma is transferred to south Korea as requested by Lee, the situation on the Korean Peninsula will deteriorate beyond control, increasing the danger of a new war, a nuclear war and adversely affecting the situation in the surrounding countries.
					
					 What matters is that the traitor flatly denied that he made such offer, far from admitting such sycophancy toward the U.S., which may entail grave consequences, and apologizing for it. 
					
					 Japanese magazine Bungei Shunju carried an article to the effect that Lee proposed the transfer of the Futenma military base to south Korea when meeting Obama.
					
					 It is too late to deny his outbursts.
					
					 Lee's traitorous, anti-reunification and bellicose true nature was brought to broad daylight through the recent disclosure of the reckless remarks made by him to serve outsiders in betrayal of the nation. The south Koreans will never be freed from the U.S. colonial rule and the whole nation will not be able to escape the holocaust of a new war, a nuclear war as long as he is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 Lee had better apologize for the acts of treachery he has committed so far and step down of his own accord before facing a stern trial by the nation.

articles.title: Young People Called upon to Become Vanguard Fighters
articles.content:
Young People Called upon to Become Vanguard Fighters
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial carried on the Youth Day calls upon all young people to eternally glorify the proud history and tradition of the Korean youth movement and more dynamically struggle to build a thriving nation and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, rallied close around the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The young people in the era of Songun are the reliable political reserves of the Party steadfastly carrying forward the tradition of single-minded unity, the most revolutionary combat ranks who are creditable successors to the Songun tradition of Mt. Paektu, and a shock brigade performing epoch-making miracles in building a thriving socialist nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 The political and ideological position of the revolutionary ranks has become as firm as a rock as millions of young people are wholeheartedly following and remaining single-mindedly loyal to the headquarters of the revolution.
					
					 Our young people are honorably protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the country on the anti-imperialist military front with the arms of Mt. Paektu in their hands and playing an important role in bolstering up the war deterrent guaranteeing the eternal destiny of the nation.
					
					 There are huge contingents of young people remaining intensely loyal to the Party and the leader among soldier-builders of the Huichon Power Station who created a new Chollima speed in the era of Songun holding high the slogan of "Let's Be Responsible for a Thousand Years and Guarantee for Ten of Thousands of Years!" and the builders of the Taegyedo Tideland Reclamation project who powerfully demonstrated before the whole world that the DPRK can do anything when it is determined.
					
					 The WPK's cause of the Songun revolution has entered a new higher stage and an immensely rosy future is in store for the Korean people. Now is the time for the young people to give full play to the heroic stamina and militant might of the young Korean people who have grown to be reliable successors to the revolution under the care of the WPK.
					
					 Very great are the trust and expectation of the WPK towards the young people in the on-going grand march for a great surge to be specially recorded in the history of the country and the nation.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redress Its Crimes of Sexual Slavery in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redress Its Crimes of Sexual Slavery in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- 109 south Korean women of different circles issued a joint declaration demanding the settlement of the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army on August 23 on the lapse of a century since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by the Japanese imperialists. 
					 The declaration said that if Japan fails to settle the above-said issue this year, too, it will have to pass on the generations to come the shame of having failed to settle the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past even in a hundred years. 
					
					 It noted that the world community has become increasingly assertive in urging the Japanese government to own a legal responsibility for the sexual slavery in the past and properly settle the issue.
					
					 It is deplorable to see the attitude of the Japanese government still evading its responsibility for the crimes, the declaration noted, adding that even the recent statement issued by the Japanese prime minister on the lapse of a century since the fabrication of the treaty did not mention the issue of sexual slavery. 
					
					 It demanded that the Japanese government make an official apology and full reparation for the most hideous violation of rights of women in human history.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past Crimes in Ukraine
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Redeem Its Past Crimes in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- The Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Ukraine-DPRK Association sent a letter to the Japanese embassy in their country on August 23 in protest against the statement issued by the chief executive of Japan on the occasion of the lapse of a century since the fabrication of the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty".
					 The letter said that his statement was nothing but an artifice to evade the responsibility for the atrocities committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean people. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities have turned their faces away from making reparation for the past crimes. This goes to prove that they are still not admitting the aggression and plunder perpetrated against the Asian people in the past as crimes.
					
					 The claim of Japan, a defeated nation, to Tok Islets of Korea and Japan's evasion of reparation for its past crimes are part of the moves to revive its militarism and this attitude is arousing concern and protest from among the world progressives.  
					
					 The letter strongly demanded that the Japanese authorities make an apology and reparation to the DPRK for such past crimes as the forcible drafting of Koreans and sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.

articles.title: US-S. Korea War Maneuvers Flayed by Bangladesh Figure
articles.content:
US-S. Korea War Maneuvers Flayed by Bangladesh Figure
 Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Chairman M. Gamrul Huda and Secretary General Sheik Rafikl of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 21 denouncing the U.S. and south Korea joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities across south Korea were a wanton violation of the Korean Armistice Agreement and a grave threat to the peace in the Korean Peninsula and the world.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and south Korea to respect the presidential statement of the UNSC which calls for peacefully solving the pending issues of the peninsula through dialogue and negotiations.
					
					 It is the legitimate right of the DPRK to bolster its deterrent for self-defence to cope with the evermore undisguised moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and provoke a war against it, the statement noted.
					
					 Denouncing the above-said war maneuvers for aggression, the statement urged the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities to stop them at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Praised
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- Personages of various countries made public statements between August 18 and 21 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egyptian Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said in his statement that Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership was a starting point in the work to consolidate the foundation of the Songun politics for upholding and defending President Kim Il Sung's idea and cause and carrying forward and accomplishing them and a declaration of his firm will to protect the destiny of the country and the nation and accomplish the socialist cause of the DPRK with the army as a main force.
					
					 Praising Kim Jong Il as a great champion of the world peace, the chairman stressed that the undying feats he performed with his Songun leadership will shine forever in human history.
					
					 The assistant to the national chairman of the Central Committee of the Brazilian Communist Party noted that the DPRK has won one victory after another in the political and military confrontation with the imperialists under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Jiri Jarka, honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, praised Kim Jong Il for having strengthened the Korean People's Army into a matchless revolutionary army.

articles.title: DPRK Significant Day Celebrated in Russia and Peru
articles.content:
DPRK Significant Day Celebrated in Russia and Peru
Pyongyang, August 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Moscow on Aug. 24 to celebrate the golden jubilee of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Displayed in the venue of the meeting were works of President   Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books on their undying feats.
					
					 Mozgovoi, acting first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, said in his report at the meeting that Kim Jong Il, attaching primary importance to the military affairs, established the Songun political mode of pushing ahead with the revolution and socialist construction with the army as a main force. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK has made signal successes in socialist construction under so difficult conditions while protecting its sovereignty and dignity from the pressure of the imperialist allied forces. This is ascribable to the Songun politics.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meeting.
					
					 An event was held in Lima on Aug. 13 to celebrate the said anniversary and the 40th birthday of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship.
					
					 Speakers there referred to the achievements and experience gained by the institute in the course of widely introducing the reality of the DPRK and conducting brisk activities for friendship and culture with the Korean people over the past years.
					
					 They stressed that socialist Korea has grown to be an invulnerable fortress and emerged a political and ideological power and a military giant possessed of powerful nuclear deterrent thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The participants of the event watched Korean film "Pyongyang Today" and enjoyed an art performance.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion de delegados de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion de delegados de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- Segun el diario Rodong Sinmun fechado 28, tuvo lugar el dia 26 en la ciudad de Phyongsong la reunion de los delegados de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En la ocasion participaron Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, y los delegados elegidos en los comites urbanos y distritales del partido en la provincia, las organizaciones de partido de distintas unidades que cumplen la misma funcion que aquellos y las organizaciones de base del partido de los organos de nivel provincial.
					
					En la reunion se debatio el problema de elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					El discurso de propuesta estuvo a cargo de Hong In Bom, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y delegado de la organizacion partidista de la ciudad de Phyongsong.
					
					La eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC es la expresion de la absoluta confianza y noble fidelidad de todos los militantes del partido y habitantes de la provincia, acumuladas en la lucha historica en que estos recorrieron el unico camino lleno de victorias y glorias sosteniendolo en el puesto cimero del partido y la revolucion, y es el reflejo de la demanda de la epoca para lograr la victoria en la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista, dijo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					Al dirigir sobre el terreno centenares de unidades de la provincia, el Dirigente instruyo claramente el rumbo y los remedios a seguir por la provincia.
					
					Gracias a su sabia direccion y abnegacion patriotica, se ha dado la orgullosa realidad en la provincia.
					
					Diciendo que enaltecer al Dirigente es la maxima fortuna, gloria e infinito orgullo de toda la nacion coreana, Hong propuso cortesmente elegir al Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					Los delegados de las organizaciones partidistas de la provincia apoyaron y aprobaron totalmente la propuesta.
					
					Acto seguido, quedo aprobada por unanimidad la resolucion correspondiente en reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todos los militantes del partido y los habitantes de la provincia.
					
					Luego, fueron electos otros delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion por centenario de invencion de tratado leonino
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion por centenario de invencion de tratado leonino
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- El portavoz del comite coreano de investigacion de danos causados por la ocupacion de Corea por los imperialistas japoneses hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion en relacion con el centenario de la proclamacion del ilegal e invalido "Tratado de Anexion de Corea a Japon".
					Los imperialistas japoneses, que legalizaron con metodos ilegales y bandidescos la ocupacion de Corea, practicaron la mas barbara dominacion colonial imponiendo a la nacion coreana incontables desgracias y calamidades, comienza la nota y continua:
					
					  Despues de su derrota en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, ellos han venido recurriendo a las maniobras para el resurgimiento del militarismo y la nueva agresion como la tergiversacion de la historia, la usurpacion del islote Tok, la sancion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el acoso a la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon, lejos de reflexionar e indemnizar sinceramente su historia del pasado llena de crimenes.
					
					  La enganosa declaracion publicada recientemente por el premier japones con motivo del citado centenario no pasa de ser otra artimana para eludir la responsabilidad de sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado al agredir a otras naciones y, por lo tanto, esta abultando el expediente criminal de Japon.
					
					  Hoy, las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para el renacimiento del militarismo y la nueva agresion se tornan mas graves por culpa de la banda de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Aunque pase mucho tiempo y se sucedan generaciones, el pueblo coreano no olvidara nunca los crimenes ensangrentados de los reaccionarios japoneses y saldara sin falta la cuenta de ellos. Y castigara implacablemente a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que trata de buscar su salvacion vendiendo la dignidad y los intereses nacionales a las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben reflexionar e indemnizar con sinceridad sus crimenes del pasado y abandonar de inmediato la politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los actos anacronicos de fomentar la division y el enfrentamiento en Corea y obstaculizar la reunificacion de esta.

articles.title: Jovenes coreanos celebran su dia
articles.content:
Jovenes coreanos celebran su dia
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- Los jovenes y estudiantes de todas las partes de Corea conmemoraron significativamente este sabado el Dia de la Juventud recordando la victoriosa y gloriosa trayectoria que ha recorrido el movimiento juvenil coreano bajo la guia de los 3 Generales del monte Paektu.? 
					Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Yang Hyong Sop y los funcionarios directivos de los organos del partido y el Poder y de las entidades de masas en el centro y las localidades visitaron la Universidad       Kim Il Sung, el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon, la Fabrica Textil de Pyongyang, el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung, la Hilanderia Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, la Granja Cooperativa de Migok de la ciudad de Sariwon, la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek y otras fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades para felicitar a los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					Ellos colocaron junto con jovenes y estudiantes los cestos, ramos y ramitas de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y los monumentos a la historia revolucionaria de los grandes hombres sin pares erguidos en las unidades respectivas y les rindieron homenaje.
					
					Recorrieron luego el museo de la historia revolucionaria, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la de presentacion del historial y departieron con los jovenes y estudiantes ejemplares felicitando sus innovaciones y exitos logrados con el entusiasmo revolucionario e impetu combativo en  la produccion, la construccion y el estudio.
					
					Y les pidieron que siguieran mostrando sin reservas el impetu heroico de la vanguardia juvenil del Songun en la gran marcha de hoy por el gran auge.
					
					 Este dia, los jovenes y estudiantes ofrecieron funciones artisticas y realizaron los torneos deportivos y de recreo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta el nuevo disparate de Hyon In Thaek
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta el nuevo disparate de Hyon In Thaek
						
Pyongyang, 28 de agosto (ATCC) -- En una reciente "reunion academica conmemorativa", el ministro titere de Reunificacion del Sur de Corea, Hyon In Thaek, dijo que la "comunidad en paz" y la "comunidad economica" devienen el proceso de "impulsar paralelamente la desnuclearizacion y la cooperacion economica" y la iniciativa del "'impuesto de reunificacion' no supone la situacion especial del Norte como 'la de emergencia'".
					  Y peroro que hay que "solucionar el problema con la larga vision y profunda respiracion previendo el futuro sin comprometerse al mejoramiento de las inmediatas relaciones Sur-Norte"
					
					  Sus dichos estan penetrados de enganos y excusas y se encaminan a embellecer e implementar a toda costa la teoria conflictiva, antinacional y anti-reunificacion del traidor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 28 y continua:
					
					  Hyon se precipito a defender la teoria conflictiva de Lee Myung Bak para aplacar la fuerte repulsa a la misma de distintos sectores sociales.
					
					  Como se ve en la palabra de "larga vision y profunda respiracion", la banda de Lee Myung Bak no tiene ninguna voluntad de mejorar las relaciones Norte-Sur caidas ahora en la peor crisis, sino acecha la oportunidad de calumniar y atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					  Esta abominable banda de vendepatrias, que recurre tenazmente a la campana de enfrentamiento y guerra en contrasentido a la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion del 15 de Junio, merece un castigo rotundo e implacable.
					
					  Ella pagara muy caro sus crimenes antinacionales y anti-reunificacion.
